Name: LU 203 - Zoning, 27 East 4th Street, Manhattan (N 170115 ZRM)
Title: Resolution disapproving the decision of the City Planning Commission on Application No. N 170115 ZRM (Preconsidered L.U. No. 203), for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying Section 74-712 (Developments in Historic Districts), concerning special permits within the NoHo Historic District Extension, Community District 2, Borough of Manhattan.

History.Description: This Resolution was Disapproved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Disapproved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

Attachments.Name: September 12, 2018 - Stated Meeting Agenda with Links to Files

Minutes of the Stated Meeting - September 26, 2018

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\b By Council Members Salamanca and Moya\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on August 24, 2018 its decision dated August 22, 2018 (the "Decision"), pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, regarding an application submitted by Kalodop II Park Corporation, for an amendment of the text of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, \cf1 modifying Section 74-712 (Developments in Historic Districts), concerning special permits, proposing to \cf0 alter the eligibility restrictions for single-story developments and  allowing modification of \cf1 use and bulk restrictions via special permit\cf0  within the NoHo Historic District Extension which in conjunction with the related actions would facilitate the development of an eight-story hotel or office building at 27 East 4th Street in Manhattan Community District 2, (Application No. N 170115 ZRM), Community District 2, Borough of Manhattan (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360  \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tab WHEREAS, the Application is related to applications \cf1 C 170116 ZSM\cf0\expndtw-1  \expndtw0 (L.U. No. 204), a s\cf1 pecial permit to modify use regulations below the second story of a building and C 170117 ZSM (L.U. No. 205), a special permit to modify bulk regulations;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\cf0\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj      \tab WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(1) of the City Charter;\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj       \tab WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on September 5, 2018 and September 17, 2018;\par
\par
      \tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use implications and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\par
\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the negative declaration issued March 26, 2018 (CEQR No. \cf1 15DCP145M\cf0 ), which includes an (E) designation to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to air quality and noise (E-470) (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote );\par
\par
RESOLVED:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620\par
\tab The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the Negative Declaration.\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj Pursuant to Section 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, N 170115 ZRM, incorporated by reference herein, and the record established before the Council, the Council disapproves the Decision of the City Planning Commission.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720 Adopted.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720\par
Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj       \tab The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx1440\tab I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on September 26, 2018, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qr\par
